meanings.definition: The quality or state of being dangerous.
meanings.sent1: The dangerousness of the situation was evident.
meanings.sent2: His job required him to assess the dangerousness of different chemicals.
meanings.sent3: The dangerousness of the cat's playful antics kept everyone on their toes.
meanings.sent4: The dangerousness of the storm was like a looming shadow over the town.
meanings.sent5: The dangerousness of the forest at night made even the bravest travelers wary.

meanings.definition: The potential to cause harm or injury.
meanings.sent1: She was aware of the dangerousness of the situation.
meanings.sent2: The warning signs highlighted the dangerousness of the cliff edge.
meanings.sent3: The dangerousness of the situation added a thrilling element to the adventure.
meanings.sent4: The dangerousness of his words cut deeper than any physical harm.
meanings.sent5: The dangerousness of the virus spread quickly through the community.
